creditline: Gift of James D. Burke in honor of Dr. John and Colles Larkin
description: picture plane divided into four uneven quadrants; top two rectangular quadrants each have abstract geometric forms with green, blue and yellow with black outlines; bottom two quadrants have abstracted figures--standing figure wearing triangular hat in LLC and portrait in profile in LRC; mottled green ground
signed: LLC in white: The Window | LRC in white: A. Ryan
title: The Window
